title: Kingdom
overview: A tale of every spy can end up being a conspiracy theory. But their truth can never be disregarded.  This time,  it's worth the hype and time.  A Comeback written for the history books.  A name that will be remembered by the masses in the coming years.  The Silent crown longing for a new ruler finds a new name, a powerhouse of aura, a persona that no one will dare to ignore.  THE "VIJAY DEVERAKONDA" will be unleashed, in his mightiest formÂ ever.
